name: TouchTask
description: ***THIS IS A TASKER PLUGIN. IT REQUIRES TASKER*** ***This app uses Accessibility services.***  TouchTask allows you to perform gestures automatically without root  Actions: Actions: tap, long tap, scroll, cut, copy, paste, set text, selection text Gestures: swipe and pinch (require Android 7+) Screen capture: screenshot and video, image compare, get image color with names and hex values, get a single pixel color (require Android 5+) Hardware key suppression Unlock screen Optical character recognition  Events: Listen to hw key events (like volume buttons) Listen to screen touch (tap, long tap, scroll) Listen to gesture (swipe up, down and so on) Listen to screen updates  Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/107846871867669301384
